summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6714 for the improvement of the alley in plat of Montbeacon, being the alley between 12th Avenue South and 13th Avenue South from South Forest Street to South McClellan Street; and certain other alleys; by paving the same; by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary; providing for the necessary surface drainage.
